headline: Is Sempra (SRE) Fairly Priced After Recent Grid Investment And Energy Transition Focus?
summary: If you are wondering whether Sempra's current share price reflects its underlying value, you are not alone. This article will walk through what the numbers are saying about the stock. Sempra's share price closed at US$87.10, with returns of 1.6% over the last 7 days, a 2.2% decline over 30 days, a 2.9% decline year to date, and a 62.0% gain over 5 years. These moves sit against a backdrop of ongoing interest in regulated utilities and energy infrastructure companies, where investors often...
